Detailed Description

StreamingWriteInfo is the info object for holding all the information about a write operation. It inherits the properties from base class StreamingInfo and additionally defines properties for holding the pointer to the data to write, for the number of bytes to write, and for the number of bytes actually written. Use this calls for write operations only.
